quotes.quote: But the thing is, even if I could go back, I wouldn't belong there anymore.
quotes.author: - Ccz

quotes.quote: I still love the people I've loved, even if I cross the street to avoid them.
quotes.author: - Unknown

quotes.quote: You remember too much, my mother said to me recently. Why hold onto all that? And I said, Where do I put it down?
quotes.author: - Anne Carson, Glass and Gold

quotes.quote: I killed a plant once because I gave it too much water. Lord, I worry that love is violence.
quotes.author: - Jos√© Olivarez

quotes.quote: I don't like how endings in real life come on so suddenly without making sense, without much warning. One minute you're in the middle of something and the next it's all a very long time ago and you're a different person and none of it is ever coming back.
quotes.author: - Unknown

quotes.quote: The lonliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: - F. Scott Fitzgerald
